name: Behind The Case - Abandoned Facility [Full Version]
name_original: Behind The Case - Abandoned Facility [Full Version]
description:
In a famous research facility, scientists are working hard to find a new drug that could save many lives. However, one day, everything changes. Scientists started experiencing strange and unusual things. They reported that they were seeing shadows and unfamiliar voices.

After some investigation, the police discovered that the facility was running illegal experiments that had disastrous results. They created an unknown creature that has incredible powers and is extremely dangerous. The creature is now shutting down scientists and making the facility a very dangerous area.

A detective leading the investigation decides to enter the facility to find out what is really going on. However, upon entering the facility, he soon realizes that he is trapped inside a mysterious labyrinth full of very scary creatures. He must survive and find a way out before the creatures find and kill him.

Controls For PC : 

  • WASD : Walk 
  • Hold-Shift : Run 
  • Left-CTRL : Crouch 
  • Interaction : E

System Minimum Requirement PC :

  • Processor : Core i5 3470 
  • Grapich : GT 710 2gb
  • Storage : 1GB available space 
  • Memory : 4GB Ram
